divs: Sighting Detailsthe west hills of portland house sitting and drinking coffee on the deck. looking up,being a aviation buff, i watched a dash 8 pass by overhead, as it passed by my eye stopped almost directly overhead and i saw an object beyond the aircraft. it was not moving and the owner of the house had a telescope with a 90 degree viewer. i set it up and viewed it for over 30 minutes. my girlfriend viewed it for about the same. we were amazed that it was barely moving...like watching the moon move through the same telescope. we had to leave to pick up the home owners,but it was still there. i called the national weather service to ask about weather baloons in the area and they told me that they had none reported at that time.
Summary: opaque circle with a distinct line bisecting it
